page.title: 12M54 MOTORWAY Continued
page.content:
The M54 now runs through Telford's new enterprize zone which opened in January 1984. Factories are along side the motorway and now the motorway gives easy access to 2 thriving airports. Now Telford has an inter-city railway link-up with Euston. This thriving industry will introduce new jobs. The Course of the M54
The motorway starts at Essington ,then it crosses with the M6. Then the motorway goes past Featherstone. Then a road called the A460 joins the M54 ,then it runs through Coven where the A449 intercects the M54. The Shropshire Union canal runs under the M54.
